summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing receipt of a draft report from OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) regarding the Epstein case and asking about sharing it with the team.

events.title: OPR Draft Report Received
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York received a draft report from the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: A draft report from the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) was received by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on August 6, 2020.
The email discusses technical issues with forwarding the OPR report via Outlook.
The sender seeks permission to share the OPR draft report with their team.
The document indicates ongoing internal review or investigation related to the Epstein case by the Department of Justice's OPR.
